General.Name: Picogram Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Picogram.co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells environment-related functional materials, and water treatment-related parts and products in South Korea. It offers countertop water purifiers, under-sink water purifiers, inline filters, filter materials, compressed carbon blocks, and FO membranes. Picogram.co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.
